meanings.definition: A person who specializes in a particular field to an exceptional degree.
meanings.sent1: The superspecialist in heart surgery performed the operation flawlessly.
meanings.sent2: The hospital hired a superspecialist in neurology to lead the research team.
meanings.sent3: The superspecialist in cake decorating made a birthday cake that looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: She was a superspecialist in unraveling mysteries, always finding the hidden clues.
meanings.sent5: The superspecialist in astronomy could identify constellations with just a glance.

meanings.definition: To become highly skilled or knowledgeable in a specific area.
meanings.sent1: He aimed to superspecialize in computer programming to advance his career.
meanings.sent2: She decided to superspecialize in pediatric care after completing medical school.
meanings.sent3: The chef wanted to superspecialize in making the perfect omelette, practicing every day.
meanings.sent4: His love for animals led him to superspecialize in veterinary medicine.
meanings.sent5: She hoped to superspecialize in ancient history, studying the past civilizations intensively.
